model_answer: The correct answer(s) are B/C. Balancing chemical equations and understanding coefficients require knowledge of the law of conservation of mass (Event C) and the concept of limiting reactants (Event D). The visual aids used in each event also reinforce these concepts.

The correct answer is A, B, C, D. All four events are necessary for understanding the concept of limiting reagents and determining solution concentrations, which are essential for balancing chemical equations and calculating yields in chemical reactions.
